availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, resident and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Mary Greenwell. Married Isabella Austin Green in Union County on October 29, 1861. Father of Mary T. Greenwell. Resident of Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 501B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 341.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Wallers Precinct, p. 422A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #000562205, p. 471.
